articles.author: Ian Livingston
articles.title: Europe’s expanding heat wave fuels record temperatures, including in the Alps - The Washington Post
articles.description: The heat was so expansive that mountaintops, including the French Alps, that are usually frozen from snowpack saw record temperatures. Heat records were set for June in Spain and Portugal.
articles.content: Heat records were set for June in Spain and Portugal over the weekend during a new surge of extreme heat thats roasting Europe. Potentially dangerous temperatures at or above 100 degrees are expected… [+4785 chars]
